https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8BEucdM9eJ27omJACKfwfhTGSa6.jpg In Northeastern Brazil, twelve-year-old Maria is sold to have a better life as a housemaid. However, Maria is resold and sent to a brothel in the Amazon gold fields and put to work by the despicable Saraiva. Angels of the Sun
